key_assumptions: Gravitons are virtual particles (no mass drain)
Paths exist in superposition until matter interaction
Coherence length depends on local acceleration
Constructive interference enhances gravity at low g

physical_interpretation.sqrt_term: Amplitude enhancement from coherent path addition
physical_interpretation.suppression: Coherence factor - paths decohere at high g
physical_interpretation.a0: Coherence scale set by cosmic expansion (cH0)

predictions.clusters: Even more enhancement (3D geometry, more paths)
